page.title: 19Dress in Jedburgh.
page.content: In school children wear uniform which consists of a blue blouse and grey or navy skirt for the girls and grey trousers for the boys.Each school has a different tie. Out of school,girls wear light coloured skirts with a blouse or T-shirt,and on their feet heeled shoes. Boys wear baggy trousers or jeans, T-shirts without sleeves or cotton shirts and on their feet flat shoes grey,black or white. Some of them wear trainers. The adult men wear jeans,cords, T-shirts or cotton shirts without sleeves and jumpers.For footwear, trainers or laced flat shoes are worn. Women wear trousers or skirts,blouses or jumpers and jogging suits.High heeled shoes and sandals are the usual footwear.
